title: late bay hub to wide 5 adapter plates

posts.content:
Hi, I'm refurbing a set of late bay hubs and callipers and want to use my wide 5 wheels with a red 9 front setup. Can anyone tell me what sort of adapters I need to get?

I'm sure I've read about this topic on here and problems with callipers rubbing on insides of wheels etc etc.

Any help appreciated..

Thanks
Steve

I've got a set of 5/112 to 5/205 adapters forsale if needed Â£100 inc post
Cheers John

I run a red 9 set up and am changing to 130 pcd so will have the 112 to 205 adaptors which came with my set up available soon. I run late bay callipers and there has never been an issue with rubbing. Give me a shout if you want them and I will work out a fair price.
